Esta inversión pretende mejorar los tiempos de entrega y con ello la rotación de cartera, además de considerar que estos productos que son de fácil rotación en su stock y esto dinamiza la reinversión del capital.  Jaime es un habitante del municipio de Barranquilla y tiene mucho entusiasmo por continuar creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Jaime started his business with the goal of improving his income. This 60-year-old male entrepreneur decided to buy some product promotions which are part of the "family basket" of basic products in order to sell them among his neighbors, friends and acquaintances. He originally bought cereals such as rice, vegetable oils, vegetables, sugar, and sauces. Little by little, he added more products as his business became successful. His business idea arose in the year 2011. Today, he has many more clients to whom he offers payment facilities so that they can pay based on their cash flow. 

He makes his purchases in cash in chain warehouses. However, his capital has been insufficient to comply with some orders of goods. Therefore, he is applying for his first Kiva loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to invest in rice, oil, vegetables, cold cuts, and detergent. With this investment, he plans to improve his delivery times and thereby his turnover. He also believes that these products will rotate easily in his stock, which will boost the reinvestment of capital. Jaime lives in the municipality of Barranquilla and he is very enthusiastic to continue growing his business.

loans.use: to invest in rice, oil, vegetables, cold cuts and detergent.

loans.name: Nubis

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar con Crédito a Nubis, con su credikiva anterior logró tener en sus estantes y vitrinas un excelente surtido y por eso se incrementaron sus ventas. Nubis se encuentra feliz por tener su casa propia y su negocio logra generar mayor rentabilidad. En la actualidad está aplicando a un crédito mediante el cual, invertirá en artículos para la temporada escolar como libretas, lápices, temperas y demás productos, ella espera tener éxito, pues cada compra la hace en el marco de las exigencias de ésta época. Nubis envia el siguiente mensaje a los finaciadores de Kiva: " Gracias por estos dineros a los microempresarios, porque con ellos he logrado muy buenas cosas en esta vida".
texts.en:
Thank you for supporting Nubis with a loan. With her previous Kiva loan, she managed to have an excellent stock to display in her shelves and display cases. Therefore, her sales increased. Nubis is happy to have her own house and her business is generating a higher profit. 

She is currently applying for a loan which she will use to invest in articles for the school season, such as notebooks, pencils, paint, and other products. She hopes to be successful as she is making every purchase within the framework of the current season's needs. Nubis sends the following message to the Kiva lenders: "Thank you for these funds for small business owners, because with them I have achieved very good things in this life."

loans.use: to stock her store for the coming season.

loans.name: Alba Ligia

texts.es:
Alba es una mujer muy trabajadora, honesta, sencilla, apegada a sus hijos y familia de ya 54 años de edad, la cual inicio por necesidad económica su negocio de Miscelánea donde ofertas cosméticos, accesorios, ropa y útiles escolares, esta actividad la cual inicio en el año 2008 ha sido lo mejor que le pudo haber pasado pues con ella la calidad de vida de sus dos hijas y de ella ha mejorado considerablemente.
Sus metas con su negocio son dos, poder comprar una vivienda propia y dejarle el legado de su negocio a sus hijas, pero para ello aún falta muchos y aprovechara este tiempo para potencializar y mejorar su negocio.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercancía en ropa, accesorios, y útiles escolares, buscando mejorar su oferta y tener precios más competitivos en el mercado.
texts.en: Alba is a very hard-working woman; she is honest, easygoing and is attached to her kids and family.  She is 54 years old and has started her business, Miscelanea, for economic reasons.  She sells cosmetics, accessories, clothes and school supplies.  She started this business in 2008 and it has been the best thing that could have happened to her, as it has helped improve her and her children's quality of live. She has two goals for her business: to be able to buy her own home and be able to leave the business to her children.  But she is still missing a lot to achieve this and so she will take advantage of the time to improve her business.  She is requesting a loan to buy goods such as clothes, accessories and school supplies.  She is looking to improve what she is offering and have more competitive prices in the market.

loans.use: to buy goods such as clothes, accessories and school supplies to sell.

loans.name: Sergey

texts.en:
Sergey lives in Goris town with his wife and son. For 15 years, Sergey has been involved in construction. He provides internal and external construction work for local people in Goris town. 

He asks for this loan to pay for tools and materials needed for providing this construction service. Sergey has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for tools and materials needed for providing construction services.

loans.name: Reyna Xiomara

texts.es: Reyna está agradecida porque gracias al apoyo financiero brindado por COMIXMUL en alianza con KIVA su primer financiamiento fue invertido en la compra de: abono, formula cafetalera y pago de mano de obra de los mozos que recolectaron el café. El crédito que se le brindo le fue de mucha ayuda por el bajo interés al cual se les presta esto le viene a mejorar sus ganancias. Ella espera nuevamente ser apoyada por los diferentes inversionistas en la plataforma de Kiva con un segundo crédito el cual está solicitando para re invertir nuevamente en sus cultivos de café siendo su conyugue quien le esté apoyando en todo el trabajo únicamente y necesita hacer el trabajo un poco más eficiente pues la propiedad es grande y quieren aprovechar el tiempo (Factor Clima) ya que hay lluvias y esto ayuda mucho a la plantación de café si tiene el cuidado necesario.
texts.en:
Reyna is grateful because her first loan from COMIXMUL in partnership with Kiva was invested in the purchase of fertilizer, coffee formula, and paying workers for gathering the coffee. This loan was of great help to her because of the low interest rate, which improved her earnings. 

She hopes to be supported once again by the various lenders on the Kiva platform with a second loan, which she will use to reinvest in her coffee crops. Only her spouse is supporting her in her work, and she needs to work a bit more efficiently because the property is large and they want to take advantage of the season due to the climate and the current rains. It is of great help to her coffee plantation if she has the necessary care.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies to reinvest in her coffee crops.

loans.name: Alexandra Valeria

texts.es: A su corta edad Alexandra es madre soltera, tiene 18 años y tiene un hijito de 6 meses, Alexandra vive con sus padres y su bebe, Alexandra va a invertir el dinero del crédito en la compra de chanchos que es su única fuente de ingresos mediante la crianza y venta de estos animales,  la aspiración  de Alexandra es de seguir adelantecon su negocio y majorarlo para darle lo nacesario a su hijito y comenta que va a luchar para continuar sus estudios que  tuvo que dejar por motivo de su embarazo.
texts.en: At her young age, Alexandra is a single mother. She is 18 years old and has a 6-year-old child. Alexandra lives with her parents and the baby. She will invest the money from this loan in the purchase of pigs. Raising and selling these animals is her only source of income. Alexandra's goal is to continue moving forward with her business and improving it to give her child everything he needs. She says that she will fight to continue her studies, which she had to leave due to her pregnancy.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es: Doña Alba es un mujer emprendedora, que a sus 60 años, no se le ha hecho difícil incursionar en la industria del mantenimiento de automóviles, ella desde hace 4 años tiene un negocio de venta de repuestos y lubricante para autos; su único apoyo ha sido su hijo. Doña Alba solicita el crédito porque desea invertir en la compra de lubricantes para ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes. Sus metas y planes son seguir con su negocio y construir otras sucursales, para tener mejores ganancias y crecer.
texts.en: Alba is a woman with great entrepreneurial spirit who at 60 years old has not had any trouble venturing into the car maintenance industry. For the last 4 years she has had her business selling spare parts and auto lubricants.  Her only help has been from her son.  Alba is requesting this loan because she wants to invest in buying lubricants to be able to offer a wider variety of products to her clients. Her goal and plan is to continue with the business and build other branches to have better earnings and grow.

loans.use: to buy lubricants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to have more working capital and to be able to buy raw material for making different types of mattresses.

loans.name: Heidy Vanessa

texts.es: Heidy tiene 21 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hija de un año de edad. Ella es una mujer luchadora quien se esfuerza mucho por sacar adelante a su familia. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de energía eléctrica en su vivienda y para encementar el piso de la misma. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, grava, etc. y pagará mano de obra para la instalación de la energía eléctrica.
texts.en: Heidy is 21 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and their 1-year-old daughter. She is a fighter who makes great efforts to get her family ahead. Wishing to improve their living conditions, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the installation of electricity and a cement floor in her home. With the amount requested, she will purchase cement, sand, gravel, etc and will pay the labor for the installation of electricity.

loans.use: To purchase: cement, sand, gravel, etc. and to pay the labor for the installation of electricity.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es: Maria en su primer financiamiento pudo adquirir los insumos agrícolas que fueron de gran ayuda para poder dar una asistencia y mantenimiento muy eficiente a sus cultivos de café lo que permitió obtener una excelente cosecha la cual vendió a muy buen precio con los diferentes intermediarios de la zona. Ella agradece el apoyo brindado por los inversionistas en KIVA y la cooperativa COMIXMUL quienes apoyan al pequeño productor y más al sector agrícola lo cual conlleva a la generación de ingresos de las familias que no tienen oportunidad de empleos privados por factores como el lugar donde habitan, la falta de inversión entre otras que no son posibles y lo único es el trabajo de campo. Nuevamente ella se acerca  a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para solicitar un segundo crédito que le permita comprar nuevamente abono, foliares, fertilizantes entre otros para poder asistir la plantación ya que está a punto de florecer y necesita de los mismos para evitar esta se caiga.
texts.en:
With her first loan, Maria was able to purchase agricultural supplies that were greatly helpful to assist and perform an efficient maintenance on her coffee crops. This resulted in an excellent yield that sold at a very good price between the different trade intermediaries of the area.

She is grateful for the support provided by Kiva lenders and COMIXMUL cooperative, who help small producers in the agricultural sector. Their support helps generate incomes for families who don't have access to private employment, because of their place of residence and the lack of investment among other reasons, and whose only option is to work in the fields.

Once again she reaches COMIXMUL cooperative to request a second loan that will allow her to buy again different types of fertilizers and other supplies that she needs to fortify the blooming crops.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to maintain her coffee crops.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es: Calzado, ropa y perfumería, son los productos de la oferta de Alexander, para su clientela desde hace 9 años. Él, padre de familia de 5 hijos, decidió generar mayores ingresos apoyado por su cónyuge, con quien ahorró lo necesario para iniciar su pequeño generador de dinero, el que hoy continúa y vende de contado y a crédito a una clientela en su comunidad, que le proporciona referidos cada vez más.   Alexander quiere que su negocio crezca, pero su mayor desafío ha sido alcanzar fuentes de financiación efectivas, que se ajusten a su negocio. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará ropa y calzado, ajustándose a esta temporada con exigencias específicas, asociadas al tradicional Carnaval de Barranquilla, que se extiende hacia todos los municipios del área y que impone los conceptos de cada negocio. Con esta inversión sus inventarios mejorarán haciendo de su credikiva una inversión que le ayuda a impactar positivamente la imagen del negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Footwear, clothing and perfume are the products which Alexander has offered to his clients for nine years. He is a father of five children. He decided to earn a higher income, supported by his spouse, with whom he saved up the necessary funds to start his small income generating business in which he continues to work today. He sells on cash and credit to clients in his community, who are referred to him more and more.

Alexander would like his business to grow, but his greatest challenge has been to find effective sources of funding which fit his business. This is why he is applying for a Kiva loan, his first with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use this loan to buy clothing and footwear, adjusting to this season with specific needs associated with the traditional Carnival of Barranquilla. This carnival spreads to all of the municipalities in the area, requiring the concepts of each business. With this investment, his inventory will improve, making his Kiva loan an investment which will help him to positively impact his business image and improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy clothing and footwear.

loans.name: Blanca Yamileth

texts.es: Blanca tiene 19 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y con buenas referencias de sus vecinos. Blanca y su compañero de vida trabajan muy duro para dar a su hijo mejores condiciones de vida. Blanca ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de la energía eléctrica en su vivienda y de esta forma dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Blanca is 19 years old and she lives in her own house with her life partner and her son. She is a very hardworking woman and has good references from her neighbours. Blanca and her life partner work very hard to give their son better living conditions. 

Blanca has taken the decision to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in the installation of electrical energy in her house and so to provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to install electrical energy in her house.

loans.name: Las Rosas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS ROSAS” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Patacamaya, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Gladys es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ganado vacuno, compra y venta de gallinas, tienda de barrio,  tejido de chompas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Gladys es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promoción masiva de la institución que realizaron en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido y venta de chalinas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años, por herencia de sus padres, mismos que trabajaban con este negocio y ella apoyaba desde niña.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de lana y máquina de tejer) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The "LAS ROSAS" communal bank will start its first cycle in Pro Mujer, part of the regional office of Patacamaya. The bank is composed of 8 members and is led by a board of directors where Gladys is the president. The businesses that the members of the communal bank carry out are varied and among them are: the sale of cattle, the purchase and sale of hens, neighborhood stores, and sweater knitting. 

The credit that they will take out will benefit some of the small micro-enterprises where Gladys is a member. She notes that it is the first time that she has been a part of Pro Mujer, joining by invitation of a massive promotion that the institution carried out in her region. At the current time, she has a business knitting and selling scarves; she made it known that she learned this business a number of years ago, handed down from her parents who worked in the business, with which she helped since she was a child. 

The credit that she will take out now is to increase the capital (purchase wool and a knitting machine), which she will acquire from the wholesaler in La Paz and after producing the items she will sell them in her retail space. This way of working will allow her to generate resources to support her family financially, since she is single. When she was asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the trainings that the institution offers.

loans.use: to purchase wool and a knitting machine.

loans.name: Hacia El Mar Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “HACIA EL MAR” iniciará el cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Zenovia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de electrodomésticos, venta de sacos de coca, venta de medicamentos naturales, venta de ropa, venta de jugos, venta de comida, venta de colchas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Zenovia es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta chompas; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió hace varios años por impulso propio, al observar que este negocio era rentable y ampliamente comercializado en el mercado. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la frontera Perú - Bolivia y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank "HACIA EL MAR" (Towards the Sea)  is starting its fourth Pro Mujer loan cycle as part of the Villa Exaltación social centre. There are 8 members in the group and it is run by a management committee with señora Zenovia as the president. 

The members of this communal bank run various different businesses including: sales of household electrical equipment, sales of sacks of coca, sales of natural medicines, clothing sales, juice sales, food sales and sales of bedspreads. 

The loan that they wish to take out will benefit small microenterprises including the one señora Zenovia runs. She tells us that she joined Pro Mujer two years ago, on the invitation of a friend who is a client of the foundation. Señora Zenovia has a business selling sweaters; she tells us that she started the business herself several years ago, when she saw that it would be profitable and that there is ample opportunity for sales on the market.   

The loan that she wishes to take out is to increase her capital to buy clothing wholesale from the women who sell wholesale on the Peru-Bolivia border. She will then sell it on her stand. 

Working this way enables her to generate income for financially supporting her family, as she lives in unmarried union and has two children. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the health centre offered by the foundation.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel Angel, tiene su pequeño establecimiento de carpintería en su casa de habitación, también sale a los departamentos a realizar diferentes trabajos de carpintería, de esta manera saca a delante a sus hijos y esposa, con el apoyo de crédito ha mejorado por partes su vivienda, y desea seguir con lo mismo ya que aun le hace algunas partes por arreglar, este nuevo crédito que solicita lo ocupara para comprar materiales y reparar las paredes y techo de la cocina, la cual no presta buenas condiciones. Con esta inversión su familia gozara de una vivienda más bonita y agradable.
texts.en: Miguel Angel has his little carpentry business in his home.  He also goes to other departments to do different carpentry jobs, this way he can support his kids and wife.  With the help of loans he has improved his home in sections and he wishes to continue this way, as he still has section he needs to fix.  This new credit that he is requesting will allow him to buy materials and fix the walls and the roof of his kitchen, which aren’t currently in good conditions.  With this investment his family will get to enjoy a nice and pleasant home.

loans.use: to improve his kitchen to garantee a better quality of life to his family.

loans.name: Maria Segunda Paz

texts.es: María tiene 62 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos nietos de 6 años y 12 años de edad. María es pequeña comerciante de pollos. Tiene mucho tiempo de poseer este negocio y muchas personas la prefieren. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la mejora del techo de su vivienda el cual con el tiempo se ha deteriorado. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, madera, hierro, etc.
texts.en:
Maria is 62 years old and she lives in her own home with her two grandchildren aged six and 12.

She has a small business buying and selling chicken, she's been at this for a long time and many people like doing business with her.

Maria is requesting this loan from FUSAI to improve her living conditions, she will invest in repairing the roof of her home which has deteriorated over time. She will buy galvanized metal sheeting, wood, iron, etc., with the requested funds.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, wood, iron, etc., in order to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy plastic kitchen utensils for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Sophia

texts.en:
Sophia, who is in her early 40s, is single with four children who are still at school. She has been running a business of selling wood since 2006.  She works from 8am to 5pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.  

This will be Sophia's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She will use this loan to increase her inventory of wood stock for reselling.  She dreams of owning a shop for cold drinks.  

Sophia will make sure she pays back her loan effectively.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of wood stock for reselling.

loans.name: Vipaji Group

texts.en:
Jamal is in his early 40s, married, and has three children who all attend school. Jamal has been running a fruit and vegetable stand for the past three years. He works from 7am to 8:30pm daily to earn a fair monthly income for his family.

This is Jamal's second loan from Tujijenge. He used the first loan to improve his food stand and paid off his loan successfully. He plans to use this loan to restock his stand. He hopes this loan will help him earn more profit so he can expand his business and renovate his house while continuing to pay for his household expenses. 

Jamal will share this loan with his loan group, Vipaji, which consists of five people who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock his fruit and vegetable stand.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy food ingredients for resale.

loans.name: Koenti

texts.en:
Koenti is 44 years old and lives together with her husband and 3 school-aged children. She is a market saleswoman and has her own market stand where she sells vegetables, fruits and various plastics wares.

Koenti wants to save for her children's education and for their future. She decided to diversify her inventory so she will purchase household goods from the wholesale market in Paramaribo for retail in Nickerie.

She lacks finances to do this and approached Seva MFI for a loan.

loans.use: to purchase plastic wares.

loans.name: Narciso

texts.es:
El Sr. Narciso tiene 60 años, está casado con la Sra. Joaquina de 53 años, viven en la ciudad de Caacupé, ambos son una pareja muy trabajadora y luchadora.
Narciso  junto con su esposa  se dedican a la Floricultura, producción  y ventas de plantas, hace más de 20 años, ya cuenta con su clientela formada que siempre van a su local de ventas para poder comprar las plantas que vende.
El Sr. solicita el préstamo para la compra de telas media sombra para reguardar sus plantas del sol, ya que le permitirá mejorar la producción de sus plantas.
texts.en:
Narciso is 60 years old, is married to Joaquina, 53, and they live in the city of Caacupé. They are a very hard-working and determined couple.

Narciso, along with his wife, has worked growing flowers, the production and sale of plants, for more than 20 years, and has a set customer base that always goes to his point of sale to be able to buy the plants that he sells.

He asks for a loan to purchase semi-shade fabric to protect his plants from the sun, since it will allow him to improve his plant production.

loans.use: to purchase semi-shade fabric to protect his plants.

loans.name: Josefa Del Socorro

texts.es: A sus 52 años Doña Josefa es una mujer que lucha día a día para seguir adelante. Desde hace 10 años atiende el negocio que su madre le dejo a cargo, una pulpería, a la vez, diversifico su negocio ya que ahora alquila habitaciones, la cual, la ha hecho crecer fuerte y prósperamente. Ella solicita el crédito para invertir en más productos para su pulpería y comprar jugos, gaseosas, reposterías, etc. así mismo para hacer mejoras en las habitaciones que alquila, pues esto le permitirá darle respuestas a las necesidades de sus clientes. Las metas de esta humilde señora son seguir invirtiendo en su negocio y sus planes futuros son mejorar su vivienda y ampliar los cuartos de sus inquilinos y de esta forma crecer y prosperar más.
texts.en: At 52 years old, Josefa is a woman who fights every day to continue getting ahead. For 10 years she has attended the business that her mom left in her care, a grocery store. At the same time she has diversified her business now that she also rents rooms, which made it grow strong and prosperous. Josefa is seeking a loan to invest in more products for her grocery store and to purchase juices, sodas, candies, etc. as well as to make improvements in the rooms that she rents. This will allow her to respond to the needs of her customers. The goals of this humble woman are to continue investing in her business and her plans for the future are to improve her home and to increase the size of her tenant's rooms and in this manner grow and prosper even more.

loans.use: to purchase juices, sodas, candies, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fresh fish for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy various products for resale.

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es:
Rodolfo es de la ciudad de Pilar, está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas, ahora está en el periodo de presentación de tesis, sueña con poder recibir su título para poder ejercerlo y tener su propia empresa.
Es una persona que quiere salir adelante y también poder ayudar a la sociedad. Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus cuotas, de manera a poder estar cada vez más cerca de su meta que es su título. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Rodolfo is from the city of Pilar. He is studying for a business administration degree. Now he is at the stage of presenting his thesis. He dreams of being able to get his degree to be able to use it and have his own business. 

He is a person who wants to get ahead and also to help society. He asks for this loan to be able to pay his fees, in this way being able to get closer and closer to his goal which is his degree. He is grateful for this opportunity that he gets to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Mariel

texts.es:
La señora Mariel es estudiante, está cursando el último año de la carrera de Psicología, comenta que recibiendo el título de Licenciada de dicha carrera podrá cumplir su sueño de abrir para su propio consultorio clínico.
Se esfuerza por poder ser una profesional que sea útil no solo a si misma sino también a la sociedad que tanto lo necesita.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus gastos de titulación que tendrá, y que debe cubrir al terminar su año en la universidad.
texts.en: Mariel is a student. She is completing the final year of her psychology degree. She told us that receiving her license for this career will complete her dream of being able to open her own consultation clinic. Mariel's efforts are being expended to join a profession that is not only useful to herself, but also to society which needs its services. She is asking for this loan so she can pay the expenses for her degree and she can cover the costs of completing her year at the university.

loans.use: to pay higher education expenses.

loans.name: Ruvicha Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se formó en la ciudad de Carapeguá, son 20 mujeres, todas ellas luchadoras y emprendedoras, que quieren dar a sus familias todo lo que no pudieron tener.
La Sra. Felicita es una de las integrantes, ella es viuda, se dedica a la cría de animales (cerdos y gallinas) que comercializa sobre pedidos,  la señora se siente privilegiada por formar parte del comité que mediante eso ella pudo emprender una  actividad el cual le sirve como sostén a nivel familiar, ella  pide este préstamo para poder comprar cerdos y gallinas para la cría y posterior venta. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe y que le ayudará a poder seguir creciendo y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
This group was formed in the city of Carapeguá. They are 20 women, all of them determined and enterprising, who want to give their families everything that they couldn't have. 

Felicita is one of the members. She is a widow, and she works raising animals (pigs and chickens) that she sells to order. She feels privileged to be part of the committee through which she was able to undertake work that has served as sustenance at the family level. She asks for this loan to be able to purchase pigs and chickens to raise and later sell. She is grateful for this opportunity she is getting, that will help her to be able to continue growing and help her family.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and pigs to raise.

loans.name: Perla

texts.es:
Perla vive en la ciudad de Encarnación, está trabajando y a la vez estudiando, es una persona muy luchadora que pone todo de sí para poder salir adelante y ser alguien en la vida.
Está en el tercer año de la carrera de contabilidad, comenta que su meta es poder recibirse y trabajar de manera independiente para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Perla lives in the city of Encarnación, she is working at the same time that she is going to school. She is a very determined person who puts everything into being able to get ahead and be someone in life.

She is in the third year of her accounting program, and says that her goal is to be able to graduate and work independently to be able to help her family. 

She asks for this loan to be able to pay the university fees, in such way as to be able to continue with her schooling as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
Andrea es una joven que trabaja con su familia en una panadería, a la par que trabaja también estudia, comenta que su meta es recibirse y para así poder ayudar a sus padres con los gastos familiares.
Comenta que su pilar es su familia, ya que siempre le han apoyado en todo lo que necesita. Ella está siguiendo la carrera de psicología y espera ser alguien útil a la sociedad.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Andrea is a young woman who works with her family in a bakery, while she works she also studies. She says her goal is to graduate and to be able to help her parents with the family expenses.

She says that her family is her pillar, since they have always supported her in everything she needed. She is studying a psychology major and hopes to be someone useful to society.

She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in paying her program fees, so that she can continue with her schooling.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Khadijeh

texts.en: Khadijeh, a borrower from Lebanon, is a married woman living with her husband and two children who are attending school. Two years ago, she started producing homemade food, which she sells to multiple customers from her community. She states that her business revenue is barely covering the her everyday expenses, so she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. She seeks to increase her income by purchasing required supplies in order to augment her productivity. As for her future plans, Khadijeh declares that she has so many dreams to realize: one of them is to become the owner of a proper store.

loans.use: to purchase needed supplies for her business

loans.name: Paulo

texts.es:
El Sr. Paulo es casado, vive en la ciudad de Carapeguá, tiene cuatro hijos mayores que él ha criado por medio de su esfuerzo y con sacrificio.
 Paulo es comerciante empezó desde muy temprana edad a dedicarse al macate (venta ambulante), realiza sus viajes a otras ciudades para poder hacer sus ventas; también se dedica a la ganadería posee varios animales.
El préstamo lo pide para poder comprar zapatos, hamacas, sabanas, etc., lo que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Paulo is married, lives in the city of Carapeguá, and has four adult children who he has raised through his hard work and sacrifice.

Paulo is a salesman who began from a very young age to work in macate (as a street vendor). He makes trips to other cities to be able to make his sales, he also works in animal husbandry and has some animals.

The loan that he asks for it to be able to purchase shoes, hammocks, sheets, etc. which will be of great help to him.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, hammocks, sheets, etc. for sale.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es:
El Sr. Nelson tiene 44 años, es separado tiene un hijo ya mayor,  y que con sacrificio ha podido criar y darle todo para que no pasen por necesidades.
Proviene de una familia que se dedica netamente a la artesanía, él con muchas  ganas de salir adelante decidió emprender un pequeño negocio, empezó vendiendo ropas y calzados por la zona urbana de su ciudad, en poco tiempo logró juntar un poco de capital para empezar a comprar más variedad de artículos y llevar a vender por otras zonas, donde ya tiene una buena clientela formada.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hamacas, frazadas, fajas y sábanas puesto que tiene muchos pedidos de estos productos para poder crecer y mejorar cada dia.
texts.en:
Nelson is 44 years old, is separated, has an adult child, who, with sacrifice he has managed to raise and give him everything so he didn't lack anything. 

He comes from a family which works purely in crafts; with great desire to get ahead, he decided to undertake a small business. He began to sell clothing and shoes in a urban zone of his city, and in a short time, managed to save a little capital to began to purchase more variety of items and bring them to sell in other zones, where he has a well-formed customer base. 

He asks for a loan to purchase hammocks, blankets, sashes, and sheets since he has a lot of orders for these products and to be able to grow and improve each day.

loans.use: to purchase hammocks, blankets, sashes, and sheets for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy pesticides and seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy pesticides and seeds

loans.name: Rincon Poty Group

texts.es:
El grupo La Victoria está en su ciclo número 17 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 4 integrantes se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, y el cual les permitirá luchar por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
La Sra. Maria integra este grupo, ella a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de la venta de ropas que hace, lucha por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Sueña con poder tener un local donde venda variadas prendas en un lugar para que sus clientas puedan tener una mayor variedad. Es una mujer muy luchadora y emprendedora que se está esforzando cada día.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas variadas para la venta, como ser: jeans, camisas, pantalones, remeras y otros, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas, luchando por mejorar su situación de pobreza.
texts.en:
The La Victoria group is in its 17th cycle with the women’s committee program.  All of them are working and helping each other get ahead.  They are working with the poverty elimination survey project, and four members are beneath the poverty line.  This will encourage them to be tenacious in order to improve their living conditions.

Maria is a member of this group.  Through her continual effort and work, and by her clothing sales, she struggles to improve her living conditions and those of her family.  She dreams of being able to have a place to sell various garments so that her customers would be able to have a greater variety.  She is a very tenacious and enterprising woman who is putting forth great effort every day.

She is requesting this loan in order to buy various items of clothing to sell.  She will buy things like jeans, shirts, pants, t-shirts, and others.  She will do this in order to be able to continue with her sales as she struggles to improve her poverty situation.

loans.use: to buy things like jeans, shirts, pants, t-shirts, and others to sell.

loans.name: 8 De Diciembre Group

texts.es:
El grupo 8 de Diciembre se formo en la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, con 20 mujeres, todas ellas amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad, que se unieron para poder salir adelante y ayudarse las unas a las otras. Ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza para poder mejorar su nivel de pobreza.
La Sra. Carmen es una de las integrantes de este grupo, ella tiene una huerta en la cual siembra todo tipo de verduras, y por medio de este trabajo tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y sus seres queridos. Ella sueña con poder seguir creciendo, y de esa forma dar a su familia todo lo que ella no pudo tener.
La Sra. Carmen solicita de este préstamo para la compra de semillas de tomate, locote  y otros, lo que le ayudará  a la misma a obtener más producción y más venta el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The "8 de Diciembre" group formed in the city of Coronel Oviedo, with 20 woman all of them friends and neighbors in this city. They got together to get able to get ahead and help each other. They are participating in the Poverty Stoplight survey to be able to improve their level of poverty.

Carmen is one of the members of the group. She has a store where she sells all kinds of vegetables and through this work she has the means to help her family and her loved ones. She dreams of being able to continue growing and in this way provide her family with all that she could not have.

Carmen is requesting this loan to buy tomato, green pepper and other seeds. This will help her to obtain more production and sell more which will help improve her income.

loans.use: to buy tomato and green pepper seeds to grow.

loans.name: El Amanecer Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama “El Amanecer”, es un grupo muy unido, que está poniendo todo de sí para poder ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida. Todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, para poder conocer la situación de vida de cada una, y conforme a ello poder crecer.
Una de las integrantes, la Sra. Idalina, quien en su encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza arrojo estar en un nivel de pobreza extrema, donde ella está luchando y esforzándose por mejorar su pobreza con su trabajo. Ella se dedica a hacer comidas varias que hace desde muy temprano, y que luego sale a vender de manera ambulante.
Ella pide este préstamo para la compra de harina, carne, aceite y huevos, lo que le ayudará en la venta de sus comidas, lo que  le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called "El Amanacer" is a very close group, which is putting everything into being able to improve their living conditions. All are completing the poverty elimination questionnaire, to be able to know the living situation of each one, and according to that, be able to grow.

One of the members is Idalina, who in her poverty elimination questionnaire came out at the level of extreme poverty, where she is fighting and working hard to improve her poverty with her work. She works making a variety of dishes that she makes from very early, and later goes out to sell them as a street vendor.

She asks for this loan to purchase flour, meat, oil, and eggs, which will help her with her food sales, which will help her to increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase flour, meat, oil and eggs to make dishes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy pesticides and seeds

loans.name: Ramadhani

texts.en:
Ramadhani, who is in his mid-30s, is single with one son who goes to school. He has been running a hardware shop for three years now. He works from 7:00 am to 6:30 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will be Ramadhani's 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loan to increase his stock of hardware and has paid back his loan successfully. He is doing great with the loan and appreciates Kiva for its support. He used the profits to pay school fees, loan dues, and household expenses. He will use this loan to increase his inventory of fast-selling hardware and to buy pillars from Iringa.  He dreams of opening another hardware shop in a different location. 

Ramadhani will make sure he repays his loan at the scheduled time.

loans.use: to increase his inventory of hardware and to buy pillars from Iringa.

loans.name: Dorinda

texts.es:
Dorinda tiene 41 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su esposo e hijos en casa propia en una comunidad pequeña en la zona rural del distrito de Zaña que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Las principales actividades que se desarrollan en este distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la actividad de siembra y venta de alfalfa, así como también a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas, patos, pavos, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 5 años contando con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Solicita préstamo para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de alfalfa, de esta manera Dorinda espera hacer crecer más su negocio, obtener más ingresos y poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Dorinda is 41 years old, in a common-law relationship, and lives with her husband and children in their own house in a small community in the rural zone of Zaña district, which is located in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. The principal activities in this district are agriculture, animal husbandry and trade. 

She works growing and selling alfalfa, and also raising small animals such as chickens, ducks, and turkeys. She has done this work for over 5 years, having experience in the business and very good personal and work references in the zone. She asks for this loan to purchase manure and fertilizers to maintain her alfalfa crop. In this way, Dorinda hopes to grow her business more, get more income, and be able to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizers to maintain her alfalfa crop.

loans.name: Anibal

texts.es:
Anibal tiene 68 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico junto a su esposa y sus 02 nietos en la provincia de Callayuc que se encuentra ubicada en la región Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú. La comunidad donde vive es una pequeña zona rural donde los habitantes se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica a sembrar café variedad catimore, cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo lo utilizará para invertir en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su terreno cultivable, esta inversión le permitirá ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que le generará ganancias para mejorar su condición económica y por ende invertir en mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Anibal is 68 years old, and he lives in his own house made of rustic materials, along with his wife and his 2 grandchildren, in Callayuc province, which is located in Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. The community where he lives is a small rural zone where the people work in agriculture, animal husbandry, and trade. 

He works growing Catimore variety coffee, he has experience in the business and has very good personal and work references in the zone. The loan will be used to invest in the purchase of manure and fertilizers to maintain his cropland, this investment will permit him to offer better quality coffee to his customers, which will generate more income to improve his economic situation, with the end of investing in better living conditions.

loans.use: to invest in purchasing manure and fertilizers to be able to maintain his cropland.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy grocery goods for her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy consumable goods for her tea shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Rafaela

texts.es:
Rafaela tiene 53 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Buenos Aires que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería principalmente.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños. Adicionalmente se dedica a la venta de aves de corral y cerdos, actividades que realiza en su domicilio. Cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. El crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Rafaela espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de ropa a sus clientes y así poder satisfacer sus gustos y preferencias lo que le generará mayores niveles de venta e incrementará sus ingresos, mejorando de esta manera su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rafaela is 53 years old and lives in Buenos Aires district, which is located in Morropón province, Piura region, on the northern coast of Peru. Life in the community is peaceful, the population works primarily in agriculture and animal husbandry. 

She works selling clothing for women, men, and children. Additionally, she works selling poultry and pigs, work that she does at her home. She has experience in the business and has loyal customers who offer very good personal and work references for her. The credit will be used to purchase a greater quantity of clothing for women, men, and children, to increase the stock in her business. With this, Rafaela hopes to offer a greater variety of clothing to her customers, and in this way be able to satisfy their tastes and preferences, which will generate higher levels of sales and will increase her income, in this way improving her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a larger quantity of clothing for women, men, and children, to increase the stock in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Pabla

texts.es:
Pabla es dueña de alquileres de departamentos, se dedica a esta actividad  hace más de 10 años, ella es viuda, y con su propio esfuerzo ha luchado para poder crecer y salir adelante.
Es una persona  muy trabajadora y emprendedora que siempre trata de dar a sus inquilinos una buena habitación para que puedan vivir siempre a un mejor costo.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de aires acondicionados  para poder mejorar las habitaciones que alquila a sus inquilinos. Agradece por esta oportunidad que reciben de poder mejorar su servicio de alquiler.
texts.en:
Pabla is the owner of apartments and she has done this work for more than 10 years. She is a widow and with her own efforts has struggled to be able to grow and get ahead. 

She is a very hard-working and enterprising woman who always tries to give her tenants a good room so that they can live at a better cost. 

She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of air conditioning units to to be able to improve the rooms she rents out to her tenants. 

She is grateful for this opportunity that she gets to be able to improve her rental service.

loans.use: to purchase air conditioning units to improve the rooms she rents out.

loans.name: San Expedito Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Expedito forma parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, todas ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza para poder conocer la situación de vida de cada una, y conforme a ella poder mejorar sus vidas.
La Sra. Nilsa es una de ellas, quien se dedica a la venta de verduras y frutas, ella en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir, en una pobreza extrema. A través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza.
La Sra. Nilsa solicita de este préstamo para la compra de verduras, frutas y otros, lo que le ayudará  a la misma a obtener más producción y más venta el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The San Expedito group is part of the poverty elimination program. All of them are completing the poverty elimination questionnaire to be able to know the life situation of each one, and according to that be able to improve their lives. 

Nilsa is one of them, who works selling fruits and vegetables. She, in her last questionnaire, showed a poverty level within level one, which is to say, extreme poverty. Through her efforts and continual work, and applying the vital behaviors of a successful woman, she is improving her poverty situation.

Nilsa asks for this loan to purchase vegetables, fruit, and more, which will help her to get more production and to sell more which will help her improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Cosmos 79 Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “COSMOS 79” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Alto Lima, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Eulogia es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de mantas, venta de moldes de sombreros, venta de polleras, tienda de barrio, venta de polleras, venta de carne y abarrotes, venta de comida, venta de turriles. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Eulogia es integrante, ella indica que es el segundo que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una vecina que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de cinturones; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio hace varios años, implementándolo por iniciativa propia al observar que este artículo era ampliamente comercializado. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de cinturones por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo venderá a las ferreterías. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “COSMOS 79” communal bank group will begin its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal de Alto Lima. It is made up of eight members and is led by officers, of whom Eulogia is the secretary. The businesses that the members of the communal bank group carry out are varied and among them are blanket sales, hat mold sales, pollera [traditional Andean skirt] sales, neighborhood store, pollera sales, meat and grocery sales, food sales, and barrel sales. 

The loan that they are getting will benefit the small business owners of whom Eulogia is one. She says that she is the second one who joined Pro Mujer, joining at the invitation of a neighbor who is a client of the institution. Currently, she has a business selling belts. She comments that she began this business a number of years ago, undertaking it at her own initiative when she saw that this item is widely sold.

The loan that she is now getting is to increase her capital (purchase belts in bulk) that she will get from the wholesalers in the city of El Alto, and later will sell at hardware stores. This type of work allows her to generate resources to support her family economically, since she is married and has three children.  

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the savings that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy belts in bulk.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.en:
Maria Luisa decided to invest in a waste-to-energy system in order to take advantage of a widely available resource on her farm: her cows' and sheep's manure. By transforming the manure into biogas and organic fertilizer, she will be able to displace the expensive LP gas, chemical fertilizers, and wood she used to buy for the operation of her farm. The biogas will be directly connected to the boiler and cookstove in the house, while the nutrient-rich fertilizer will be applied on the corn field to increase its yield in a natural way. Maria Luisa will close the natural cycle on her farm, become more self-sufficient, and improve her cost-effectiveness while she treats the manure and protects the environment. She will have more income available to improve the infrastructure on her farm, such as building a backyard for her cows and a warehouse. As she spends less on fossil fuel-based external inputs, she will be able to buy higher-quality food for her cows as well.

This loan represents 8% of the total cost of the biodigester, the remaining part being covered by a government subsidy.

loans.use: to acquire a Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Las Mariposas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS MARIPOSAS” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana , está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Sofía es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ropa, tienda en general, venta de lana, venta de frutas, venta de comida, venta de mantas, venta de verduras. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Sofía es integrante, ella indica que hace ocho años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de su comadre que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa de bebe; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio hace varios años con un capital básico, posteriormente decide ampliar su negocio ya que es un buen producto en el mercado. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa de bebe por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la confraternidad con sus compañeras de Banca Comunal que la realiza en la institución.
texts.en:
The “LAS MARIPOSAS” communal bank has started their first loan with Pro Mujer, as part of the Panamericana regional office. It is made up of 8 members , lead by a board of directors with Sofía as the President. The businesses of the members of the communal bank are varied and amongst them are: selling clothing, a general store, selling wool, selling fruit, food sales, selling blankets and the sales of vegetables.

The loan will be of benefit to all the micro-entrepreneurs of which Sofía is one. She says that 8 years ago she joined Pro Mujer on the invitation of a good friend who is a member of the institution. Her business is selling baby clothing. She learned the business and started it a number of years ago with a basic amount of capital. Later she decided to expand her business as it is a good product in the market.

The loan she is now taking will be used to increase her working capital (buying baby clothing wholesale) that she will acquire at wholesalers in the city of El Alto to later sell in her sales space. This form of work allows her to generate resources to support her family economically as she is single and has 4 children.

When she was asked what she liked about Pro Mujer she replied that she likes the fellowship with her companions in the communal bank that exists in the institution.

loans.use: to buy baby clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Libertad Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LIBERTAD” iniciará el décimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Gladys es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de silpancho, costura de polleras, venta de chompas, venta de rellenos, venta de pollos al espiedo, tienda de pulpería, venta de comida, venta de cosméticos, venta de mantas. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Gladys es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de confección de ropa; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio hace varios años con un capital básico, posteriormente decide ampliar su negocio ya que es un buen producto en el mercado. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra tela por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la confraternidad con sus compañeras de Banca Comunal que la realiza en la institución.
texts.en:
The “LIBERTAD” communal bank group will begin its tenth loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal de Panamericana. It is made up of nine members and is led by officers, of whom Gladys is the president. The businesses that the members of the communal bank group carry out are varied and among them are silpancho [a traditional Bolivian dish] sales, pollera [traditional Andean skirt] sewing, sweater sales, relleno [traditional Bolivian dish] sales, rotisserie chicken sales, grocery store, food sales, cosmetics sales, and blanket sales. 

The loan that they are getting will benefit the small business owners of whom Gladys is one. She says that two years ago she joined Pro Mujer, joining at the invitation of a friend who is a client of the institution. Currently, she has a business making clothing. She comments that she began this business some years ago with basic capital. Later, she decided to expand her business since it is a good product in the market. 

The loan that she is getting now is to increase her capital (purchase fabric in bulk) that she will get from the wholesalers in the city of El Alto and later will sell it in her sales space. This type of work allows her to generate resources to support her family economically, since she is married and has three children. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that that she likes the fraternity with the members of the communal bank group that they have in the institution.

loans.use: to purchase fabric in bulk.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Virgen de Fatima, se formó en la ciudad de San Pedro, una zona eminentemente rural, donde las integrantes sueñan con poder ir mejorar el barrio donde viven, y así crecer y dar a sus familias todo lo que pudieron tener.
La señora Tomasa es una de las integrantes, trabaja como comerciante, trae artículos diversos para la venta como ser prendas, calzados, y otros, se provee de Asunción y cada mes viaja para traer nuevos artículos. Con este trabajo mantiene a su familia y lucha cada día por poder crecer.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas, calzados, y otros, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas, luchando por su familia y sus seres queridos. Agradecen todas por la oportunidad que han recibido.
texts.en:
This group is called "Virgen de Fatima". It was formed in the city of San Pedro, a very rural area where the members dream of being able to improve the neighborhood where they live and thus grow and give their families all that they can.

Tomasa is one of the members and she works as a businessperson. She brings in a variety of products for sale such as clothing, footwear and others. She stocks up in Asunción and every month she travels there to bring back new items. With this work she supports her family and struggles each day to grow. She is requesting this loan to be able to buy clothing, footwear and others. In this way she can continue with her sales, fighting for her family and loved ones.

All the members are grateful for the opportunity they are receiving.

loans.use: to buy clothing, footwear and others to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy hay and medication

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy hay and medication

loans.name: Kuña Pora Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Pora  está en su ciclo número 6 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Concepción, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aún se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona de difícil acceso, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra. Gladys es una de las integrantes, que se destaca por ser una persona muy luchadora y emprendedora, que poco a poco y con su esfuerzo se ha abierto camino. Ella comenta que se ha hecho ya de muy buena clientela, todo esto porque sus comidas son muy ricas y aceptadas por sus clientes.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos varios para poder hacer sus comidas, como ser verduras, condimentos, carne, pollo y otros, de manera a poder seguir deleitando a sus clientes con las ricas comidas que hace. Todas agradecen por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The group named Kuña Pora is in it's sixth cycle of the committee of women program. The group is from the city of Concepción, which is a somewhat remote area of downtown that is still growing. It is an area of difficult access, so the members of this group want to fight for growth and give the area where they live a better environment and that they grow slowly. 

Mrs. Gladys is one of the members who is known for being a fighter and an entrepreneur, who slowly and with her efforts has made her way. She says that she has already made a very good clientele, because her foods are very rich and acceptable for her clients.

She asks for this loan to be able to buy various inputs to make her foods, such as vegetables, condiments, meat, chicken and others to be able to continue delighting her customers with the rich foods she makes. They are all thankful for the opportunity to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, condiments, meat, chicken and others

loans.name: Lucy Lorena

texts.es: Lorena es madre soltera, tiene 26 años de edad, tiene 2 hijas que están en las edades de 5 y 8 años  y ya asisten a la escuela, Lorena se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores, al jornal y también se dedica a la agricultura sembrando pequeños huertos de productos que se dan en la localidad donde reside Lorena, ella va a invertir el credito en la compra de chanchos para seguir mejorando su negocio y en algun momento comprarse una casita ya que en la actualidad vive arrendando.
texts.en:
Lorena is a single mother, she is 26 years old, and she has two daughters between the ages of 5 and 8 who already go to school. 
Lorena works in the breeding of small animals for daily wages, and also in agriculture, sowing small orchards of products that grow in the location where she lives. She will invest the loan in the purchase of pigs to keep improving her business, and at a certain time, buy herself a house, as she is currently renting.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Daysi

texts.es:
Doña Daysi es una mujer de 38 años, responsable y trabajadora. Ella desde hace 20 años se dedica a atender arduamente desde su casa sus dos negocios, un salón de belleza y una pequeña pulpería. Realizar ambas labores le ha permitido sacar adelante a su familia y poder pagar los estudios universitarios de sus dos hijas, a las cuales desea ver realizadas profesionalmente y llenas de éxito.

Doña Daysi solicita el crédito para invertir en productos para su pulpería de esta manera comprar útiles escolares como: cuadernos, lápices, etc. con el objetivo de ofrecer más cosas a sus clientes y de esta forma tener mejores ganancias, para poder seguir apoyando a sus hijas y verlas graduadas. Sus metas y planes son convertir su pulpería en una miscelánea y poder llegar a comprar un automóvil.
texts.en:
Daysi is a 38-year-old woman, responsible and hard-working. For 20 years, she has worked very hard in her two home businesses, a beauty salon and a small grocery shop. Doing both jobs has allowed her to help her family get ahead and pay for the university studies of both of her daughters, who she hopes become professionally fulfilled and very successful. 
Daysi asks for the loan to invest in products for her grocery shop, so she can buy school supplies, such as: notebooks, pencils, etc. with the goal of having more items for her customers, and in this way, improve her income, to be able to keep giving support to her daughters and see them graduate. Her goals and plans are to transform her grocery shop into a general store, and be able to purchase a car.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies, such as: notebooks, pencils, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in a Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
18 son las mujeres que integran este grupo llamado Maria Auxiliadora, son personas que se unieron para poder salir adelante y dar a sus familias todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener, todo por medio del programa de eliminación de la pobreza.
Norma, una de las integrantes de este grupo, además es la presidenta de este grupo, ella es una mujer que se esfuerza siempre por poder salir adelante y dar el ejemplo a sus demás compañeras. Comenta que se dedica al comercio, ya que tiene una despensa que poco a poco ha ido montando y mejorando para poder dar a su familia lo que no ha podido tener.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para su despensa, como ser: verduras, frutas, carne, pollo, bebidas, lácteos y demás, de manera a poder continuar con sus ventas y mejorando sus condiciones de vida y sus ingresos.
texts.en:
There are 18 women who make up this group, called Maria Auxiliadora. They are people who got together to be able to get ahead and give their families everything that they weren't able to have, all through a poverty elimination program.

Norma is one of the women in this group, in addition to being the president of the group. She is a woman who strives to get ahead and be an example to the other members. She says that she works as a merchant and she has a store which she has set up and improved little by little in order to give her family what they haven't been able to have. 

She is asking for this loan to buy items for her store, such as vegetables, fruit, beef, chicken, beverages, dairy products and more. This way, she can continue with her sales and improve her standard of living and her income.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruit, beef, chicken, beverages, dairy products and more.

loans.name: Crecer Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CRECER” iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de German Busch, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Verónica es la Tesorera. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de deportivos, venta de salchipapas, venta de dulces, servicio de transporte, venta de ropa, venta de cemento.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Verónica es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio tejido a macramé de prendas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su madre quien trabajaba con el mismo negocio, donde ella apoyada desde niña, con el pasar del tiempo decide implementar un negocio independiente. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de tela por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en concubinato y tienen una hija.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y capacitación que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Crecer” starts its third cycle in Pro Mujer, as part of the regional office of German Busch. It is made up of eight members, and is managed by a board of which Veronica is the treasurer. The businesses of the members of the communal bank are varied, among them are: sale of sporting goods, sale of fried potatoes with hot dog, sale of candy, transportation services, sale of clothing, and sale of cement. 
The loan they will get will benefit small micro entrepreneurs, where Veronica is a member. She says she has belonged to Pro Mujer for a year. She joined because of a friend’s invitation, who is a client of the institution. Currently she has a business knitting garments in macrame. She says she learned this business from her mother, who worked in the same business. Given support since she was a child, as time went by, she decided to open her own business. 
The loan she is getting is to increase capital (purchase fabric at wholesale) which she will get from the wholesale sellers in the city of La Paz, and after the making of the garments, she will sell them in her sales stall. This way of work allows her to generate income to support her family economically, as she lives with a partner and they have a daughter. 
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the health area and the training offered by the institution.

loans.use: to purchase fabric.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.en:
Fifty-four year old Leonor engages in farming. She tills the land and grows rice. She resides in Talibon, Bohol, and she has been farming rice for 20 years now. 

Leonor is asking for a loan to buy a water pump and fertilizers. These will help increase the yield on her farm and the quality of her rice, as well. Her income will improve her finances. She will also be able to have healthy food and improve her living conditions.

Leonor dreams of expanding her business to make it sustainable in the future.

loans.use: to buy a water pump and fertilizers

loans.name: Malinda

texts.en:
Malinda is a hard working mother and a resident of the town of  Talibon, Bohol. She earns a living by raising and selling hogs. She is 44 years old, married, and has five children. Her oldest is 15 and her youngest is 8. Aside from hog raising, Malinda also engages in the buying and selling of empty  shells for decoration. She has been engaged in that business for more than 10 years.

Malinda has requested a loan to buy more empty shells and to purchase pig feed. With the loan, she will be able to purchase more empty shells and raise quality hogs. She will then be able to provide her children with proper diets and better shelter to live in.

In the future, Malinda is determined to handle both her sources of livelihood to support the schooling of her children for a brighter tomorrow.

loans.use: to purchase pig feed for her hog raising business and to buy more empty shells for her other business

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina runs a sari-sari (variety) store, selling various commodities including eggs, flour, sugar, condiments, powdered milk, and toiletries. She is 44 years old, married, and has two children, ages 10 and 6. 

Gina is asking for a loan to purchase stock for her store like snack foods, beverages, and soft drinks. With these, her store will be filled with a variety of stock and will attract more customers. This will help her to improve her income and be able to manage her finances. 

Gina is hoping that she will be able to expand her sari-sari store to become more sustainable.

loans.use: to purchase stock for her store like snack foods, beverages, and soft drinks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy raw materials for her crafts business

loans.name: Justa

texts.es: Justa compró materias primas en un mayor volumen para ganar descuentos,  hoy se siente más satisfecha con su inversión pues ha incrementado sus ganancias, las cuales  ha invertido en hacer adecuaciones a su vivienda para mejorarla. Ella muy feliz y  agradece a los financiadores de Kiva, porque asegura que con su apoyo, logro ampliar su casa y esto es bienestar para su familia. En la actualidad está aplicando  a un nuevo financiamiento con el cual comprará una estufa industrial y materias primas e insumos para incrementar mucho más su producción de comidas.
texts.en: Justa bought raw materials at a large volume to get a discount. Today she feels more satisfied with her investment, because her profits have increased, which she has invested in doing repairs to her house to improve it. She is very happy and she thanks Kiva lenders, because she says that with their help, she managed to expand her home, and this brings well-being to her family. Currently she is applying for a new loan with which she will buy an industrial oven and raw materials and supplies to increase her food production much more.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial oven and raw materials and supplies.

loans.name: Mona

texts.en:
Mona is a mother of four children from northern Israel. After her children became teens, she began learning hair styling and cosmetics. Her talent become well-known and she began teaching others in her area. Mona started her salon to gain financial independence and make sure her children and family could improve their finances. She keeps her clients by providing quality services and introducing new products and techniques.

Mona needed this loan to assist in purchasing a makeup station and supplies, new furniture for a sitting area, closets and storage, and hair straightening materials and supplies. She wants to continue to see her business grow while also assisting other women in learning skills. Mona wants to make sure each of her children gains an education.

loans.use: To assist in purchasing a makeup station and supplies, new furniture for a sitting area, closets and storage, and hair straightening materials and supplies.

loans.name: Angelica Griselda

texts.es:
El interés y la pasión por ayudar a las personas, fue lo que impulsó a Angélica a estudiar la licenciatura en enfermería. Esta joven de 26 años preocupada por la salud de la sociedad, estudia todos los domingos en la universidad, trabaja los días de semana y sustenta a su pequeña de dos años de edad, junto a su esposo. Además es apoyada moral y económicamente por su hermana y sus padres quienes poseen una sastrería desde hace muchos años.
Angélica está a punto de convertirse en una Licenciada en Enfermería, lo que le dibuja una sonrisa satisfactoria en su cara. Por esta razón, es que está solicitando un préstamo para pagar su curso de titulación y poder finalizar con esta etapa tan importante en su vida. Con esto ella podrá desempeñarse en la licenciatura como tal. En sus metas está realizarse profesionalmente y poder estudiar en un futuro no muy lejano, alguna especialización.
texts.en:
